2fa.dashboard_desc_enabled: Two-factor authentication is currently enabled on your account
2fa.dashboard_desc_disabled: You do not currently have two-factor authentication enabled on your account. Click the button below to begin configuring it.
2fa.disable_password_desc: In order to disable two-factor authentication you will need to provide your account password.
2fa.forced_desc: Your account must have two-factor authentication enabled in order to continue.

setup.input_desc: Enter the code from your authenticator device after scanning the QR image.
setup.qr_alternative_desc: Alternatively, enter the following token into your authenticator application:
setup.enabled_desc: Two-factor authentication has been enabled on your account. Should you lose access to your authenticator device, you'll need to use one of the codes displayed below in order to access your account.
setup.store_securely: <bold>These codes will not be displayed again.</bold> Please take note of them now by storing them in a secure repository such as a password manager.

validation.code_required: You must provide an authentication code to continue.

api.required: You must provide a description in order to continue
api.valid: Your description must be at least 4 characters in length
api.title: API Keys
api.no_keys: No API keys exist for this account.
api.new_desc: The API key you have requested is shown below. Please store this in a safe location, it will not be shown again.
api.key_desc: Are you sure you wish to delete this API key? All requests using it will immediately be invalidated and will fail.
api.allowed_ips_desc: Leave blank to allow any IP address to use this API key, otherwise provide each IP address on a new line.

password.required: You must provide your current password in order to continue.
password.confirm_failed: Password confirmation does not match the password you entered.
password.new_desc: Your new password should be at least 8 characters in length and unique to this website.
password.valid: Your new password must be at least 8 characters in length

email.updated: Your primary email has been updated.
email.required: You must provide an email address in order to continue
email.valid: You must provide an valid email address in order to continue
